inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

on back of each photo, in pencil: [#49092]; on back of b, in pencil: [c.7]
markings: on back of b, stamped in blue: [FOTO MARTIN CHAMBI / CUSCO - PERU / PROHIBIDA LA REPRODUCCION]; impressed in paper, between both images at center bottom and on a, LLC: [Foto: Martin Chambi J. / CUZCO PERU]
title: Panoramic View of Machu Picchu, Peru
